name: CVE-2022-21824
description: Due to the formatting logic of the "console.table()" function it was not safe to allow user controlled input to be passed to the "properties" parameter while simultaneously passing a plain object with at least one property as the first parameter, which could be "__proto__". The prototype pollution has very limited control, in that it only allows an empty string to be assigned to numerical keys of the object prototype.Node.js >= 12.22.9, >= 14.18.3, >= 16.13.2, and >= 17.3.1 use a null protoype for the object these properties are being assigned to.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:nodejs:node.js:*:*:*:*:-:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:nodejs:node.js:*:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:nodejs:node.js:*:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:nodejs:node.js:*:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:peoplesoft_enterprise_peopletools:8.58:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:peoplesoft_enterprise_peopletools:8.59:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_enterprise_monitor:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_server:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_connectors:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_workbench:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_cluster:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:11.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:snapcenter:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:oncommand_workflow_automation:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:oncommand_insight:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
